start.text:
Welcome to Text adventure! You're on an island, you have 0 food, 0 water, 100 health, 0 xp and 0 levels.
There are 2 choices:
1. Left
2. Right
Which one do you choose? (g4:option1 / g4:option2)

choices.left: You found yourself some water, +1 water. and you also found food, +2 food. You are now in a cave.
